entry.content:
This is an automatically generated changelog for release `stable-20250824`.
From previous `stable` version `stable-20250819` there have been the following changes. **One package per new version shown.**
### Major packages | Name | Version | | --- | --- | | **Kernel** | 6.14.11-300 | | **Gnome** | 48.3-1 | | **Mesa** | 25.1.4-1 ➡️ 25.1.7-1 | | **Podman** | 5.5.2-1 | | **Nvidia** | 580.76.05-1 ➡️ 580.76.05-2 |
### How to rebase For current users, type the following to rebase to this version: ```bash # Get Image Name IMAGE_NAME=$(jq -r '.["image-name"]' < /usr/share/ublue-os/image-info.json)
# For this Stream sudo bootc switch --enforce-container-sigpolicy ghcr.io/ublue-os/$IMAGE_NAME:stable ```
